Info.Title: Black Butler
Info.Genre: Action, Crime, Drama, Fantasy, Horror, Mystery, Thriller
Info.Actors: Hiro Mizushima, Ayame Gôriki, Yûka, Mizuki Yamamoto
Info.Plot: After her supposed death, a young woman returns as the son of her noble family to precede the family's prestigious company, with a demon at her side to avenge her parent's murder.
